Question & Options:
What notable recognition did the movie 'Neerja', released in 2016, receive for its portrayal of a real-life hero?
Options:
A. It was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Picture.
B. It received numerous accolades, including awards and nominations.
C. It won the Golden Globe for Best Foreign Language Film.
D. It was recognized as the highest-grossing film of the year.
Correct Answer: It received numerous accolades, including awards and nominations.

What accolades did the movie 'Neerja', released in 2016, receive?
